A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is a corporate exploitational cash-grab. Sure\, that's always been Star Wars's gimmick to some degre\, but this has the writing structure of a Disney Channel TV movie. Pandering to the wallets of next generations is clearly more important than telling a decisive and thoughtful story. Critics must have some kind of financial incentive to praise this film the way they have\, because anyone with a decent idea of what a well-structured story is can see how cringe-inducing this mess is. As a viewer\, I feel condescended.
